title: Jay's Redemption
description: Charisma Quinn and I were at each other’s throats even before my father killed hers.Something about her gets under my skin and won’t get out.But she’s the key to a great new direction for my MMA promo company,so I have to come face to face with her again.I can’t deny my attraction to her, even as we fight.And I can’t deny the ghosts of our past either,especially when the sexual tension between us gets too intense to ignore.The path to redemption isn’t going to be a smooth one for either of us...
author: Jax McKay
